headline: Palo Alto Networks CyberArk Deal Redefines Identity Focused Security Platform
summary: Palo Alto Networks (NasdaqGS:PANW) has agreed to acquire CyberArk in a transaction valued at about $25b. The deal brings CyberArk's identity and privileged access management capabilities into Palo Alto Networks' security portfolio. The combination is intended to create a unified, identity centric cybersecurity platform for enterprise customers. Palo Alto Networks focuses on network, cloud, and security platform offerings, and CyberArk is known for tools that control and monitor privileged...

headline: Palo Alto Networks Completes Acquisition of CyberArk to Secure the AI Era
summary: Palo Alto Networks® (NASDAQ: PANW), the global cybersecurity leader, today announced the completion of its acquisition of CyberArk, establishing Identity Security as a core pillar of its platformization strategy. The addition of the CyberArk Identity Security Platform enables Palo Alto Networks to secure every identity across the enterprise - human, machine, and agentic.
